wiktionary_senses.definition: An agreement between parties concerning the sale of property; or a contract by which one party binds themself to transfer the right to some property for a consideration, and the other party binds themself to receive the property and pay the consideration.
An agreement or stipulation; mutual pledge.
An item purchased for significantly less than the usual, or recommended, price
A gainful transaction; an advantageous purchase.
To make a bargain; to make a deal or contract for the exchange of property or services; to negotiate; to haggle.
To transfer for a consideration; to barter; to trade
